TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBindingConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于计算对象的属性并将其转换为 。The is used to evaluate and convert a property of an object into a . 将 应用于 类型为的类 作为参数。The is applied to the class with the type of the as an argument. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 永远不应创建类的实例 。You should never create an instance of the class. 请改为调用的 方法 。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
